title: Callback for all tasks and launchers
body: Would be nice to have a callback on for example the phonecalltask so that we can determine wether or not the user actually did press "call" or "cancel". Same for other tasks and launchers.

comments.body: Even a return of a bool from the show() method would be better to know whether the user actually pressed the "call" or "do not call" button.
I have raised similar one for smscomposetask and i did mention that it would be nice have same / similar set of events rather than the current way.
